name: ThunderClaw
details:
DistortionThe crushing decimation of thunder leveling everything, leaving a wake of silence so loud, it can't be ignored.
A crisp flash of pure electric energy jets down from above delivering a flash so bright the pupil shrinks to a needle's point.
And you haven't even played a power chord into it.
Welcome ThunderClaw.  Welcome.
https://www.mrblackpedals.com/products/thunderclaw
